name: Dusklight Manor
description: You are a young man that was offered a great opportunity for a new job and you decide to take it. You arrive at the Dusklight Manor to begin your new life and work, here you meet three wonderful girls that are under the tutelage of Mistress Clara, an enigmatic figure with more secrets than you can imagine. The girls you meet are Lizzie Monroe, Mary Best, and Lola Mod and you can build up relationships with each of them, depending on who you like more. While working around the house you notice Mistress Clara using a sort of magic on the house butler to make him younger but you set that aside, believing you are imagining things...​

name: Dark Souls II: Seeker of Fire
description: An overhaul mod for DS2 SOTFS that adds an entirely new experience to your next playthrough. This mod will rebalance the game mechanics and difficulty, as well as decorate and fill in objects in areas that feel a little empty, expanding upon the work of Tales of Drangleic.

name: Dark Deity: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Girlfriend FNF Battle Friday Night Funkin
description: Trying to hook up with Girlfriend, but her ex-rockstar father Daddy Dearest doesn't approve of him. The plot of the game centers around our protagonist, Boyfriend, Play with music beats and challenge your dad's girlfriend to win her hearts and the wiki medal.

name: Mazeman
description: Mazeman is a game that will challenge you big time thanks to its frantic pace: enter the maze and look for the key while avoiding all kinds of dreadful monsters. Lots of unlockables, monsters, levels, power-ups and collectibles await you in this beautiful endless stream of pixel art mazes filled with some awesome arcade vibes!

name: Arma 3: Creator DLC - CSLA Iron Curtain
description: Engage your enemy in mechanized infantry operations, Special Forces raids and long-range patrols in an alternate 1980s Cold War Czechoslovakia!

name: Payday 2: The Ukrainian Prisoner Heist
description: This heist DLC sees the Payday Gang hitting the San Francisco docks in order to rescue a friend in trouble.

name: Deep Night Detective: Chapter One
description: Deep Night Detective, the monochromatic mystery metroidvania! Created by Wilson Taylor with music by Lewmoth!

name: Dice Tactics
description: A video game that plays like your favorite tabletop RPG game. With every roll, fate is placed in your hands.

name: Pokémon GS Chronicles
description:
Pokemon GS Chronicles is a game modded from Pokemon Fire Red, taking the story from Heart Gold/Soul Silver, and changing a few things about it. Pokemon have been added, as have typing's, moves, and Mega Evolution. Take the original story from HGSS and expand on it, find that your rivals are much more in depth than they were, and travel your way through Johto earning badges from gym leaders that actually have Strategies this time and make your way to the first ever Johto Pokemon League. On your way you'll have to catch many Pokemon and stop Team Rocket though!
If you want an extra challenge, you will be given the option to randomize your file as well. Good Luck!

name: Horny Girl Hentai Puzzle
description: Horny Girl-Hentai Puzzle is a puzzle game, the ultimate goal of which is to swap the blocks to collect the image. But remember, the purpose of this game is to let you relax and enjoy the process. To do this, we added a minimalistic interface and relaxing music.

name: Railroad Ink Challenge
description: The critically acclaimed roll and write game that is all about connections. Plan your routes, connect the exits around your board, expand your transportation system, and reach networking nirvana! Play solo to beat your own best scores, or challenge players from all over the world!

name: Warage
description: Warage is a classic RTS that will take you to a magical fantasy world.

name: Restless Night
description:
Hordes of zombies and bloodsucking bats, dozens of deadly mutants and cannibals, reanimated maniacs and pumpkin-killers - can you handle these mobs? You will have to survive through the night each and every time you'll play Restless Night.
This game is full of horrifying encounters with undead enemies, but your rifle will come in handy! Can you make it to the dawn? There's only one way to find out - grab your favorite firearm and get ready to crush, kill and destroy all these zombies with classic old-school style.

name: Hello Teacher
description: Hello Teacher is both an action and survival horror multiplayer game in which one crazed, unstoppable Teacher hunts down four kids through a terrifying nightmarish world in a deadly game of Cat & Mouse.

name: Maybe I Can
description: Welcome, we're putting you in the brain of Tyler Lee who wants to destroy the world. But it won't be easy. Tyler is going to get in a lot of trouble. Let's see if you can get Tyler Lee to achieve his goal.

name: Zombie Strike
description: Zombie Strike is a strategy RPG with AFK gameplay and various elements. Survivors can recruit heroes, transform zombies, build a mighty team to defend their home! This game has high intelligence AI automatic play. Let's say goodbye to manual operation, free your hands!

name: Depths of Horror: Mushroom Day
description: This is a 3D first-person adventure and horror game that lets you plunge deep into your fears. A unique cave system, enemies and screamers. While picking mushrooms in a clearing, you stumble upon an abandoned hut. Exploring it, you find yourself in a cave full of unexpected inhabitants and surprises

name: Wayfinder
description:
Wayfinder is a web-based generative art game that takes the player on a contemplative cause-and-effect journey through nature.

Combining artificial intelligence, machine learning and generative processes, each experience is as unique and ephemeral as nature itself. Players move a mystical character through the landscape in search of poetic tokens which, when activated, reveal words hidden in the wind. The poems and visuals players see today will never appear in the exact same way ever again.

name: Incredible Dracula: Legacy of the Valkyries
description: Gather your undead cronies and set off on a journey through fantastical lands and past fierce creatures of legend to claim a treasure beyond imagination! Count Dracula awaits your arrival.

name: Immortus Temporus
description: In "Immortus Temporus" crashing into hazards is... A perfectly viable strategy to beat the levels faster! Following the obvious routes won't get you the "gold medals" in this game. It's rules are designed to be broken. It is made for speedrunners, by a speedrunner.

name: Side B
description: Find yourself back in 1998 in Poznań, Poland. You are a time traveler, Johnny, who wants to move into the present time, but who knows... how? Play and find out. Solve interesting puzzles, enjoy relaxing music, and have a great time like in old times.

name: Mortal and Monster
description: Mortal & Monster is a challenging rogue-like action RPG developed for 6DOF VR platform. We are aiming to combine tower-defense battle system and rogue-like dungeon map together to make an epic single player VR dungeon adventure.

name: Counter Punch
description: A 2D multiplayer online boxing game with quick and fun gameplayer. Host a private or public match to play

name: Cube Jump 3D
description:
Cube jumps where orange marker points.
Do not touch lava!
Press and hold for jump (Jump force is max 500)

name: Together
description: Color the World together! Discover a new world, but do not do it alone - take a friend and play together! Travel together through increasingly demanding levels of difficulty in many interesting biomes. Color the world decolourised by the evil Mona Chrome! You will be accompanied by some popular and distinct heroes who can, but certainly do not, remind you of familiar characters. Our heroes are monophobes, so they must act together to get her!

name: Luna's Fishing Garden
description: Luna's Fishing Garden is a cozy fishing and building game. Catch fish, trade it in and create the garden of your dreams by planting new trees, placing water objects and bringing animals to the archipelago.

name: Queer and Chill
description:
Queer & Chill is a spicy and challenging puzzle full of pride flags, and lots of diversity. Improve your skills while discovering new and exciting ways to match people based on their sexuality.
Learn, evolve, and most of all, be curious.

name: A Murmur in the Trees
description: A Murmur in the Trees is a short first-person mystery adventure. Explore the atmospheric forest on your quest to find the truth.

name: Prison Architect: Second Chances
description: Prison Architect: Second Chances gives your inmates a fresh start with reform and rehabilitation features, helping them improve behaviors and reduce sentences.

name: The Sisters: Party of the Year
description: Let's get into mischief! Join Maureen, Wendy and all their friends in this new video game adventure! Challenge your friends in crazy mini-games and explore the Sisters' city.

name: Farlight 84
description:
Farlight ’84 is set in a post-apocalyptic world where a zombie cyber-infection has spread across the population. The majority of the human race is now known as “zomborgs,” which has placed the survivors in ceaseless fights to the death with one another because that’s just how these games work.

The game is played from a third-person perspective with a large focus on mobility, as characters boost around with jetpacks. There’s also a healthy dose of vehicles they can drive around, plus a crafting system. One interesting feature is that players are rewarded with building materials after each match that they can use to construct refuges, which are places to hang out with friends in-between matches.

name: Runestrike
description: We’re taking the best elements of classic turn-based strategy games and expanding on them in new ways. Runestrike brings familiar but refreshing game play for both competitive PVP and single player content.

name: Headspace: Unwind Your Mind
description: Do you want to relax, meditate or sleep deeply? Personalize the experience according to your mood or mindset with this Headspace interactive special.

name: Brigand: Nightmare
description:
BRIGAND - NIGHTMARE revamps the original story of BRIGAND - OAXACA, adding in more difficulty and new features from the BRIGAND - PANAMA DLC such as woodcraft, traps, and voodoo-casting baddies, as well as a new optional map accessible from Chapter 6 on.

It's a lot harder than the original, meant for hardcore fans. Hunger increases 50% faster, and baddie AI now picks up items. There is also a partial Spanish translation included called NIGHTMARE (ES).

name: Hitman 3: Seven Deadly Sins Act 3 - Sloth
description:
HITMAN 3: Seven Deadly Sins takes you deep into the mind of Agent 47. Get exclusive sin-themed suits and take on brand-new challenges to unlock unique rewards. Can you resist all seven sins?

This DLC pack includes Act 3: Sloth. All seven Acts can be purchased together in the Seven Deadly Sins Collection.

name: Bullymario's New Super Mario World
description: Mario and Luigi take a great adventure in a New Land with 80 exits.

name: Tuiterland 0rigins
description: Live the traves of the main three superusers of the series and the motives behind their outcomes! Discover the origins of many of the iconic characters of the series and visit new regions formerly never seen in this prequel set 10 years before the events of Tuiterland 1!

name: Moth Manor
description: Moth Manor is a short spooky text adventure about an abandoned manor, cryptid encounters, and discovering yourself.

name: Dead by Daylight: Survivor Expansion Pack
description: Will you be a leader? A hero? An escape artist? The Survivor Expansion Pack gives you access to 11 original characters to discover and explore.

name: Dead by Daylight: Killer Expansion Pack
description: There's more than one way to sacrifice a Survivor. The Killer Expansion Pack gives you access to 11 original characters to explore and unleash.

name: Nuclear Day
description:
An exciting survival simulator in a post-apocalyptic world!
A fascinating survival in a post-apocalyptic world!
Amazing game with a unique atmosphere! Try to survive in a post-nuclear city.
Can you handle the post-nuclear world? Radiation, hunger, disease and suffering are everywhere. And your only goal is to escape from the dying city and find the love of youth. Unique Atmosphere and deep story. Solve the mystery of the lost documents and make choices: will you save everyone or will you leave them to die...

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Mastery Challenge
description: Mastery Challenge is a free update that introduces replayable trials to test your expertise against Melee, Range, and Stealth objectives. Unlock new unique rewards as you perfect your skills, including weapons, tattoos, decorations, and more!

name: Last Bet
description:
--Around 4:30 pm on June 5, a male student (14) from a private junior high school fell from the roof of the school he was attending. The boy died shortly after the fall at the hospital he was transferred to.

The police treated the case as an accident and the investigation was over. A bad event that happened unexpectedly. The misfortune that happened unexpectedly and unintentionally.

Is it okay to end this tragedy that happened about a month ago as an accident?

name: Dead By Daylight: Resident Evil Collaboration Bundle
description: All characters from Resident Evil, in a single affordable DLC for Dead By Daylight!

name: UFO 2: Extraterrestrials
description: Are strategy games with strong RPG elements your cup of tea? Did you enjoy games like Xcom: UFO Defence, the Fallout series, the Civilization series, the Heroes of Might and magic? And now you are looking for something new to satisfy your craving for turn-based fun?

name: Maze: Pedestal of Trials
description: Maze: Pedestal of Trials is a sequel spin-off to our original puzzle game, Maze. This entry into the TreeFall Studios Maze series brings all new challenges, new game-play abilities, new environments, and new puzzles.

name: Mini DayZ 2
description: Mini DayZ 2 drops you square in the middle of a zombie apocalypse. Embark on dangerous Raids to gather food and materials then use them to build a safe haven for your group of survivors. Hop into multiplayer mode to join forces with your friend or with survivors from around the globe. Work together to preserve humanity on both Android and iOS mobile devices!

name: Forbidden Proton
description: Forbidden Proton has been developed with over 80 unique frenetic action puzzles inspired by early science fiction with a modern twist. Featuring: over 80 puzzles, different characters to play, frenetic, challenging and fun action-based puzzles, cool 2d retro sci-fi style graphics Simple Arcade One-Touch Control, and real-time physics.

name: Tower Ball
description: Build turrets to destroy balls & earn cash, spend it to upgrade and get stronger

name: 学院逃生
description: Use the seven days you have left to explore the waste left by your classmates in the college, and make good relations with them, so as to increase your chances of escaping from here.

name: Bloons Pop!
description:
Those Bloons may look cute and colorful but they've made a mess of Monkey Town, and it's up to you to pop them all and set things right!

Aim your friendly Monkeys then watch them jump right into the puzzle and use their signature abilities to pop as many Bloons as possible. Merge shots into powerful Mega Monkeys and unlock bonus Hero Monkey shots to help you win!

Each victory helps you rebuild the beautiful village scenes that the Bloons disrupted. Place buildings, characters, pets, decorations, and a variety of other interactive, animating objects to make each Monkey Town your own creation.

name: Logistics Simulator
description: Logistics Simulator As an active member of a shipping company in a major city around the world, you can play with up to 10 friends in a multiplayer co-op mode or single player mode to help you understand what the cargo workers are going through, and maybe will make you rich.

name: The Whitetail Incident
description: A short horror game where you have to survive cultist, with a shotgun in hand can you make it to the end?

name: Killer Ricky
description: Play as Killer Ricky and avenge his family by killing all members of a bloodthirsty Mafia organization.

name: Extended Stay
description: Extended Stay is a monster-girl brothel management sim where you must keep your guests satisfied to succeed. By satisfying your guests you'll unlock sex scenes and earn money to keep your brothel in business.

name: Jixxaw: Party Time
description: It's PARTY time and they're all waiting for you! Put the pieces together to solve the puzzle and reveal HD, realistic, naughty & sexy girls!

name: Die Rangliste
description: Die Rangliste is a leaderboard-run twin-stick shooter inspired by games like Geometry Wars and Downwell. The game features a unique time-stop and teleport mechanic.

name: Place for Hero
description: A game in the genre of adventure, in which you have to look for a missing Sheep, simultaneously exploring the world and helping the inhabitants of a small forest village.

name: Yerba Mate Tycoon
description: Yerba Mate Tycoon is a unique management game. You are taking care of a yerba mate production shop/company, create, customize various yerba mates, unlock new upgrades, and grow your company. Don't know what yerba mate is? Let's say it's a coffee alternative in South American countries.

name: Fruit Zumba
description: Classic Zuma, reset back! One of the most classic and joyful games, we have launched a new content: a new game map, gorgeous animation effects, well-designed levels.

name: Grind
description: Grind is skateboarding game with old school mechanics.

name: Anime Sunset Ride
description: Anime Sunset Ride is a puzzle game in which you have to find pairs of objects in the company of adorable girls.

name: Tank Fantastic
description: Tank Fantastic is an indie arcade game made in 2.5D graphics and Sci-Fi style.

name: The Evil King
description: Text-Based Game, Adventure Game

name: Speeder
description: Speeder is a game that aims to avoid obstacles. The speed increases with every minute. Break your records. Dynamic music will enhance your experience.

name: Black Space
description: Black Space is a free arena-styled singleplayer 2D space shooter using top-down perspective.

name: Run and Jump Little Vico
description: Little Vico is an alien who finds himself on a planet where there are tests of devices for changing gravity.

name: Hard Steel
description: Jump to the arena with your robot and show who's boss... watch out for traps, losing is easy but winning is not!

name: The Terrible Persistence of Memory
description: When you wake from a deep sleep, the first thing the goblin doctor asks is "What's your name?" The problem is: you don't know. Retrace your steps. Find what you've lost. Piece together who you are from the strange and incredible things you can do

name: Red Algorithm
description: Can you survive alone against hundreds of monsters? It's not easy. Try out Red Algorithm, a simple yet intense 2D top-down shooter with RPG elements. Pick up weapons, upgrade them, get new perks, and use powerful bonuses. Try out several different heroes against dangerous evil creatures.

name: Dead by Daylight: Resident Evil Chapter
description: Resident Evil is a new Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a Killer, Nemesis; two Survivors, Leon S. Kennedy and Jill Valentine; and a new map. Purchasing the add-on unlocks the new Killer, both Survivors, and an exclusive universal Charm.

name: Blocky Puzzle
description: BLOCKY PUZZLE is a challenging puzzle game where you need to fit all the shapes in the grid to complete the level. Put the shapes to the right place on the game board without empty spaces and every shape in place. Features: - Supports Square, Triangle, and Hexagon shaped levels. - Starts simple and gets progressively more difficult

name: Huntdown: Collector's Edition
description:
The Huntdown Collector's Edition includes:

Huntdown physical game
Collector's Box with sleeve
John Sawyer action figure
Three button pins
Four embroidered gang patches
A 50+ page art book
The soundtrack on cassette
A reversible 18"x24" poster

name: The Dark World: Edge of Eternity
description: The Dark World: The Edge of Eternity is a horror survival game. Players will fight for survival in the cruel dark world of Werewolves, Witches and Vampires, or they can embrace the darkness and become one of them. Try to save your race from total extermination in Singleplayer or Multiplayer mode.

name: Jigoku Unko
description: Our character has a tantrum after eating spicy Adana Kebab. Then he finds himself in hell for some unknown reason.

name: The Annoying Game
description: Run, jump, die, repeat. Help Teddy on his journey through the complex, 2D dungeon, where every step will try (and usually succeed) to kill him. Are you patient enough to finish one of the most difficult games of the year?

name: Bara Giants
description: Bara Giants is a visual novel mixed with JRPG elements about an agent working to keep giants in control. Meet unique giants, Make your own choices, Use forbidden potions, Are you really willing to do your job or are you afraid of having your heart won by big men?

name: Dark Deity
description: Command legendary heroes to reshape a land fractured by broken oaths, reckless war, and a secret search for arcane power. The ancient artifacts and powerful weapons you discover will empower your cast of 30 playable characters as they form bonds and battle their way into legend.

name: Cruelty Squad
description: Cruelty Squad is a tactical first person shooter set in the hardcore gig economy of corporate liquidations. You're an emotionally dead combat-substance fueled grunt of Cruelty Squad, a depraved subsidiary company tasked with performing wetworks for its host conglomerate. Will you make the Corporate Arch Demoness proud or succumb to bitter tears of failure?

name: OOTP Baseball Go!
description: OOTP Go! is the mobile version of Out of the Park Baseball.

name: Degrees of Lewdity
description: Degrees of Lewdity is a text-based erotic sandbox roleplaying game, currently in development by Vrelnir.

name: Garlic
description: A retro-style video game set in a manga-ish absurd world.

name: Spellcaster University
description: Develop a prestigious university of mages. Build rooms, train your students, fight orcs, slay the bureaucrats, manage your budget... a director's life is not a quiet one.

name: Wildermyth
description: Wildermyth is a character-driven, procedurally-generated tactical RPG. Lead a band of unique heroes as they grow from a reluctant farmers into legendary fighters. Battle threats lurking in the Yondering Lands and discover secrets that the land has to offer.

name: Widelands
description:
In Widelands, you are the regent of a small clan. You start out with nothing but your headquarters, where all your resources are stored.

In the course of the game, you will build an ever growing settlement. Every member of your clan will do his or her part to produce more resources - wood, food, iron, gold and more - to further this growth. The economic network is complex and different in the three tribes (Barbarians, Imperials, and Atlanteans). Progress and create your own clan.

name: The House the Dead Built
description:
Set after a breakdown of your car, you decide to go find help which leads you to a nearby house. Inside, you discover that experiments are being completed on people transforming them into horrible creatures.

Trapped & with seemingly no way out, you must descend further into the house, uncover the truth & escape with your life.

name: Nyanaconda
description: A small rhythm game based on Nyanners cover of Anaconda.

name: ArduGods
description: Your goal in this game is to gather faith and a cult following to become stronger and be able to battle the rest of the Gods, to reclaim your place among them as the most powerful ever, and it all starts by raising prayers with your Arduboy buttons.

name: Romantic Holic
description: After a terrible breakup with her boyfriend, Jaime finds a white phone amongst his belongings. Jaime ends up connecting to her dream through the strange app on the phone named 'Dream Connector' where she ends up meeting a mysterious man...

name: Late Fees and Damages
description: to be but a childe with a book

name: CyberSex 2069
description: Collect loads of “sensitive data” (hentai) on the Cyber by defeating sexy hackers in real time combat. Hack networks and devices to amass even more “data”. What else is the Cyber good for? A good laugh, actually.

name: Fire Embrace: Erabareshi Chigyuu no Ken
description: メタル同人音楽サークルが（何故か）製作した、Windows向けの無料ゲーム。邪道RPG。

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: North Star
description: North Star is the twenty-first expansion for Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege. It adds one new Operator from the Star-Net Aviation.

name: Samurai Shodown: Shiro Tokisada Amakusa
description: This digital purchase will unlock the DLC character "SHIRO TOKISADA AMAKUSA" for your copy of SAMURAI SHODOWN.

name: No Fear
description: No Fear is a top-down arena shooter in which the player has to fight against hordes of various monsters. Challenge them using various weapons. You must survive!

name: Your First Girlfriend
description: When was your first girlfriend? Now although we have grown up, but will inadvertently think of the first girlfriend?

name: Nanoscape VR
description: Nanoscape VR takes users on a journey to the microscopic world. Explore the surface and interior of a cancer cell, exploring and learning about cellular anatomy and processes.

name: Mycro
description: Mycro is a gateway to another dimension! A series of Micro-Games await you on the other side! Surely you wish to visit?!?

name: Mr. Hopp's Playhouse 2
description: A young girl needs to find her friends, unravel a dark mystery and escape the clutches of her cursed toys.

name: Vortex Rolling
description: Vortex Rolling is a third-person runner-style arcade scoring game.

name: Akinofa
description: Akinofa is an arcade shoot 'em up with Roguelite elements.

name: Terra Atlantis
description: Terra Atlantis is a first person shooter for single players. Explore and discover thoses worlds and try to finish the trials created by gods from this far galaxy.

name: WTF Is Wrong With You?
description: Have you ever wondered WTF Is Wrong With You? Well, so have we... Let's find out together, shall we?

name: Mazeing
description: 3D labyrinth game Solve minigames to finish the level. In-game shop of upgrades. Tutorials.

name: Life Finds A Way
description: A short 2D platformer in which you are traversing a cave for a magic flower to save earth.

name: Gos Castle Runner
description: Run against time, jump holes and saws before time runs out. Gos Castle Runner it's a 2D platform game of running and jumping. In this game, you control a small ghost that has to pass through the castle by jumping holes and dodging saws to reach the end of the level.

name: FukTopia 2
description: A post apocalyptic Beat Em Up game.

name: Erotic Jigsaw Puzzle 4
description: Challenging 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzles featuring hardcore sex scenes by Lolita LineArt, on a smooth luxury graphical background.

name: VR Monkey King
description: The lake is calm, lotus swaying, immortals meditate here; the high mountains are towering, the big Buddha is solemn, the old man meditates in Dingqing; the wall stands thousands of people，the immortals practice martial arts to absorb the essence of the sun and the moon.

name: Airline Manager 4
description: Create & manage your own airline

name: Brytag Studio
description: You are a filmmaker with big ideas and a small budget. With Brytag STUDIO, your story is the game. The free-to-play app gives you the power to bring your big idea to the screen.

name: Silent dream
description: In the dark corridor as wide as a labyrinth, avoiding numerous pursuers who are aiming for their lives. Will you be able to save the missing person and escape safely!?

name: Cascade Cafe
description: Join a group of friends as they play a relaxing path building boardgame, inspired by games of the Suujin Taisen genre. Place your tiles to line them up and connect their bridges, then combine their values to build unique sequences.

name: Mushihimesama
description:
Mushihime-sama is a manic shooter developed by Cave and released by Taito in 2004. It has been ported to many consoles over the years and in 2021 it was ported again, this time to Nintendo Switch.

The Switch version of Mushihime-sama includes the standard, Arrange, and v1.5 versions. It also includes modes like normal gameplay, Score Attack, and Training. You can save your Replay Data as well and check out Leaderboards to see how well you’re doing. Different difficulty levels are available too, ranging from Easy to Hard. There are also Original, Maniac, and Ultra mode options for each difficulty.

name: Previous Tenant
description:
An indie horror game with an emphasis on sounds and jumpscares, Previous Tenant is not for the faint of heart.
Who can solve the puzzles and explore the stories surrounding the mysterious Previous Tenant?

name: Last Room
description: Last Room is a logical puzzle game in the genre of fantasy horror.

name: Do Animals Dream?
description: You’re shipwrecked on a mysterious island of talking animals! You’ll need to make friends with the local critters if you hope to return home. This adventure includes memorable conversations, exploration, multiple endings, and dark secrets...

name: Soran
description: Soran is an arena shooter/RPG hybrid being developed and produced by Joseph Keenan. Use classic shooter weapons like the Sniper or Doob Tube, along side new and unique guns like the Defenestrator to finesse your way to victory in 1v1s, 2v2s, and small scale Battle Royales. When you aren't competing, you can explore the world of Four Shores discovering collectables, making friends or padding your stats for the next battle. Also there is a flying dog named Friend.

name: Qual
description: Qual is a fast paced top-down bullet hell that emphasizes on spell combinations.

name: Tiled Together
description:
Spend coins to spin the slot machine and earn coins by joining tiles together. Some tiles will give coins for being adjacent to other certain tiles. There are many tile group combinations to discover that each has different adjacency bonuses and point values. Earn as many points as you can before you run out of coins!

There are a handful of tile combinations. Place four of the same tile types together! Or try surrounding your tile on all sides. Bankruptcy is inevitable, but there's always a new map to draw up and new Share your biggest discoveries with other mapmakers, or spread rumors of the creatures that inhabit the deepest waters.

Maps are Tiled Together in this world. Journeys are revealed with the turning of ancient ceremonial tiles. By will alone, you create the landscape for adventurers, merchants, and miscreants. Bring together townsfolk to develop cities, reveal the path to an oasis in the middle of endless sands. Lay the world out in front of everyone. Your craft is a gamble but not without its rewards. A new discovery could result in a windfall of gold and renown!

name: Corpus Pugna
description:
Once, there was a man of honour. Once, there was a council of four… The throbbing, twisting, sightless gods of he. Heroes and villains this man slaughtered in their name, and with his quarry’s blood exalted them.

He was their champion, and their warden. Their master, and their slave. Unable to command, they conveyed their will through pain.

Your champion has met his greatest foe. Join together, and let your righteous fists fly true!

name: Wolf And Moon: Nonogram
description:
This logic puzzle that anyone can enjoy.
Wake up your brain with hundreds of puzzles.
Nonogram is a picture puzzle game in which players color the empty cells according to given numbers.
Find the illustrations hidden behind the numbers!
Find the answer while following simple rules and complete the amazing dot illustrations by coloring them.
Upgraded tutorial and convenience features are available.
If you like logical puzzles, play this game now!
Complete the cool dot illustrations by following some simple rules.
Enjoy the hundreds of cool dot illustrations for you to collect.
Collect various dot illustrations while reading a great story!

name: The Ninja Gaiden as Interpreted by MiniMacro Sound
description: This is a from-the-ground-up reimagining of the first Ninja Gaiden NES game. All of the levels are redesigned from scratch, the soundtrack is entirely remixed and there are new graphics.

name: Unholy Adventure 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Sleep the Blackbird
description: Sleep the blackbird is a hand-drawn 2d puzzle game made in a form of comics with lovely watercolour illustrations and beautiful music. Follow the heart-warming story about Sonya and the blackbird who can't fall asleep. As the story unfolds, few puzzles will be on your way.

name: L8R
description: A traditional Yume NIkki fangame, starring a girl named Muratsuki who lives in her room. Made for Dream Diary Jam 5.

name: Mingle
description: Find your perfect match in the crowd. Match and merge minglers. Repeat until they're all joined together. 50 unique playable characters.

name: Bip + Bop
description: Bip and Bop's worlds are converging - and it looks pretty scary! Help Bip and Bop return their worlds to order by alternating between them and compounding their unique abilities!

name: In the World Unknown
description:
This is a game about a person who is lost and is trying to find his path...

In the World Unknown, tries to connect the player and sound together while showing the beauty of the world with the power of light...

The player wakes up in a strange dream world and is trying to figure out the place he is at, and where ever he goes a light follows him, helping him to see the beauty of the world, a strange sound is calling the player towards itself...

While going through the world, the player remembers his life and he finds peace in this present moment, He understands that the beauty he is trying to find all his life outside is actually inside of him and then he finally goes into the light...

name: Alkaline
description:
Alkaline is a Quake 1 mod & map pack, based on Rubicon 2 by metlslime.
Alkaline greatly expands the enemy roster & adds additional weapons and features to the Quake base game.

name: Sloppy Eater
description:
Get to the end of the supermarket without running out of blood!
This game was originally developed for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam.

name: The Intruder
description: The Intruder is an attempt at joining together survival horror gameplay and decision making with visual Novel storytelling and presentation.

name: Contractually Bound
description: You are trapped inside an office and you don't know how you got there. All you see is a contract in front of you and when you break it, it effects the world around you. You explore the seemingly abandoned office in hopes of finding your escape.

name: Abducting Mjolnir
description: Help Grooby fix his ship using Thor's hammer

name: Clotheslines
description: Find the pairs and connect them using clotheslines!

name: LastCall
description:
You play as a bartender named Felix. Felix makes cocktails for his unusual customers and converses with them. Mostly, he just listens and lets them do all the talking.

Help Felix make the right drinks to please his customers and possibly change their moods.

name: WarTorn
description: Action Platformer with unique Controls.

name: Paisible Soirée au Fil d'Étoiles
description: Join starts together to restore constellation

name: Telephone Trouble
description: A Paper's Please/Cook Serve Delicious like switch board management game. Connect as many calls as you can!

name: Claw
description: Slide, spin and snap to solve puzzles with your claw.

name: HookCat
description: A short topdown puzzle-solving game about a detective cat with a grappling hook

name: Paddleground
description: A First person paddle ball-er

name: Hentai Jigsaw Photo Studio: Fruit Girls
description: This is the perfect game for those who want to enjoy the famous and juicy Fruit Girls while playing with just one hand! Complete puzzles by choosing your challenge level and indulge yourself in the most delicious photo shoots you've ever seen. Unlock all Fruit Girls for a special surprise!

name: Pixel Adventure
description: Help Pixel navigate Retupmoc in this quaint 2D platformer, as they search for lost pixels.

name: S.O.T.A 2
description: S.O.T.A - Stalker Online Time Anomaly is a multiplayer MMO TPS game with RPG and open world survival elements. The game takes place in an anomalous zone. The setting of the game is the Soviet local post-apocalypse.

name: Action Commando 2
description: The Action Commando Saga continues as the evil Cultists have taken over Saturn and are controlling people's minds on earth with their eldritch technology. The only person who can stop them is Chronos, the Time Travelling Spartan Soldier.

name: Pazing By
description: Pazing By is a GRAZE-oriented with 2D platformer and bullet hell game, player need to dodge enemy's bullets or stay near enemy to damage enemy. A game for graze lover, dodger, and bullet-hell player!

name: Catch the Bowling Balls
description: Catch as many bowling balls as possible!

name: Ship Shifters
description: ShipShifters is a chaotic online co-op multiplayer Battle Royal game. Up to 75 players on 25 ships are fighting for victory at sea! Your crew, consisting of you and one or two of your best mateys, is confronted by a wave of dangers. Use your ship's stations wisely to be the last crew standing!

name: HPRZ: The Syndrome
description: HPRZ: The Syndrome is an online multiplayer survival, where the main challenge is to keep your character alive in an open world in 64 km. Scarcity of resources will make healthy, infected individuals fight for survival in a land without law.

name: Wind Wind
description: Wind Wind is a puzzle adventure game. Lead the souls to the top floor of the tower, avoiding robots and the black star which are in the way

name: Relax Fly
description: Relax Fly is a bird runner simulator that offers you to feel these very wings, to become a bird, although not really, but at least virtually! Feel the freedom, weightlessness and wind in the feathers, which is not given to feel any person on the whole planet!

name: Clouzy!
description: Most clouds float along in the sky, but these adorable fluffy clouds need to be taken care of in cloud daycare! Explore the world, collect delicious fruits, and cook tasty meals in this cute and wholesome farming game.

name: What the Pho: restaurant startup stories
description: What the Pho: Roguelike restaurant startup! is an upcoming cooking/simulation game about creating your own dream restaurant, participate in competition and become the best chef in the city. Design, cook, server, get money, upgrade and repeat. Support single-player and coop up to 4 players.

name: Minute of Islands
description: Explore strange and wonderful islands and dark labyrinths below in this narrative puzzle platformer. Guide young mechanic Mo on her quest to repair a world on the brink of collapse. The powerful Omni Switch at your disposal may not be enough to fix the damage that hides beneath the surface...

name: Lumberhill
description: Lumberhill is an action multiplayer party game for up to 4 players. You can either play locally or join friends online, playing in Coop Mode or 2v2 Versus Mode. Working as a team, you and your fellow lumberjacks must cut down trees and fight side by side to get the job done.

name: Battle For It All
description: Battle For It All follows the story after a catastrophic disaster, The world and its economy suffered major causing riots, mayhem and destruction. A program was launched called BFIA (Battle For It All) to put against 100 players on a remote island test facility filled with animals, bandits, and of course the 99 other survivors you must kill in order to survive and get the prize of 10,000 BFIA (Battle For It All Points) currency used in the game.

name: MP3: Maple Blossom Beach
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Official Level Design Contest 2021- Round 1
description:
Welcome to Round 1 of the 2021 SRB2 Official Level Design Contest! A collection of fan-made levels for Sonic Robo Blast 2! After six long months, we hope it's worth the wait.

Thanks to all our contestants! Have fun!

Single Player​:
- Drenched Dam Zone - Voidy2246
- Koopa Kastle - glaber
- Emerald Glade Zone - DoodlesYT
- Abyss Caverns Zone - Yyeellooww7
- Falcon Emissary Zone - InferNOr
- Bombastic Beach Zone - Shapeshifter Boi
- Music Mash Zone - WasifBoomz
- Zaxel's Thunder Yard - Zaxel (Chaolino)
- Teal Tundra Zone - SunCyclone
- Lava Temple - Vixuzen
- Ante-Station Zone - Twins'R'Okay
- Blizzard Bastion Zone - PhilJFou /// ChaRG
- Mercury Mine Zone - Rexeljet
- Fort Sunset Zone - DylanDude
- Ridge Rapids Zone - particle
- Hollow Hill Zone - Othius, Inazuma & Spectorious

Match​:
- Uncharted Badlands Zone - MK.exe
- Lost Lake - ketchupik
- Lake Side Match - glaber
- Magmor Match - glaber
- Sunset Hill - Chuckles troll

Battle CTF:​
- Metallic Madness Zone - Ruberjig & Apollyon Woman
- Oiled Wasteland - InferNOr

name: Ninja Poison
description:
Riuken has been captured.

His efforts to protect the lands of Sindara have been in vain. The army of Lord Oni Antrax is sowing chaos in its path and exterminating one by one all the royalty of Sindara. The only hope there was is over, Riuken is imprisoned in the Prison Dungeon built by Lord Oni Antrax himself.

Our protagonist is the son of King Haoken of the Highlands of Sindara, of an unattainable power that has been banished by the Machiavellian Lord.

His next target was Riuken the King's son, he has captured him and injected him with a lethal poison that will consume his life little by little.

Some time ago King Haoken went in search of Lord Oni Antrax, arriving and entering his infernal laboratory, where he manufactures this deadly poison. Haoken disappeared and was never heard from again. Until today Riuken has been a prisoner. The King has been leaving along the winding road some antidotes that will keep us alive.

The road is hard, but Riuken has the great hope of finding Lord Oni Antrax and kill him once and for all, so that happiness can return to Sindara.

name: Quake: The Purifier
description:
The Purifier is a large expert map for Quake by Zothique.
This large blood sewer level with traps averages at half-an-hour playthrough for experienced players. It is based on the Copper mod and comes with a few new ambient sounds.

name: 3D MiniGolf Remastered
description: Sin descripción

name: ​Cubeetle: Game of Creation
description: Have you ever dreamed of building your very own video games. but don’t know how to code? If so, then we have a tool...

name: Monomyth
description: A Tale as Old as Time!

name: Watch_Dogs 1985
description: Parallel universe Watch Dogs

name: Doomer's Adventure
description: An platformer game about collecting stuff to bear with reality. Just like life, this game is short and meaningless, filled with existential questions of being.

name: Little Shell's Adventure
description: Little Shell's Adventure is a difficult, beach-themed, Action-Adventure game with a retro art style, open-world elements, and an engaging combat system.

name: Fluff Labs
description: Help Fluff labs conquer the world (of the snack industry) by mixing chemicals. In this first person logic puzzle game you need to figure out what colours to mix, seperate and react to finish each level. In each level you race against time to satisfy corporate to advance to the next stage.

name: Alien Flex
description: Aliens are very fond of flex. This guy is no exception, he wants to dance for you. But for that he needs space drugs for aliens. You need to kill all the guards and steal drugs.

name: Yokai Taiji
description: Yokai are creatures of different shapes and sizes but with greater power than humans. Yokai Taiji is an adventure game set in Japan. You will take the role of the last hunter of Yokai, who seeks to rescue his grandmother from these beings. Fear not and seal the Yokai.

name: Bakumatsu Renka Shinsengumi
description: This is a romance game for women where you become the first female soldier in the Shinsengumi, fight alongside the other soldiers, and fall in love. Experience historical battles alongside the likes of Kondo, Hijikata, and Okita.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Isekai Quartet Adventure - Action Game
description:
Take control of Albedo, Megumin, Emilia, Tanya, and Raftaria, and conquer all 18 stages!

One day, a "button" suddenly appeared in the classroom. Pressing the button transports you to a mysterious world. Will everyone be able to return to the school safely?

Complete the "Isekai Quartet" Gallery! In each stage, there are hidden items that can be viewed in the "Gallery" once collected. Will you be able to find all the items? "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series where you can enjoy games created using the action game production software " Pixel Game Maker MV"(Not available on Nintendo Switch) on Nintendo Switch.

name: Balloon Jump
description: There is only one thing to do: JUMP! Can you stay alive?

name: Dev Inc
description: An in depth game development simulation game

name: Woute
description: We play for small shaman in the world of dreams, which moves in a static world to move to the next level

name: GraveRunners
description: This is an arcade runner game. Choose your teenage character and run through the spooky graveyard streets in a Halloween theme.

name: Suspicious Downpour
description: Suspicious Downpour is a very short single-player comedy horror experience about getting stuck in a storm while out camping. Sit in your tent with your trusty flashlight in the calm rain and just relax. Just be warned If you look for trouble you might find it.

name: Guns and Grapples
description: Guns and Grapples is a 2D platformer shooter where you play as a Ninja with grappling hooks and guns to kill enemies and complete levels. It uses force based physics and has several unique worlds with different enemies and platforming obstacles to master.

name: Clawfish
description: Clawfish is a fishing claw machine game. Visit an isolated train station with a fishing arcade. Explore the dock, play the machines, and take some time to relax by the water.

name: Amneron's Legacy
description: Amneron's Legacy is a classic style RPG PC game that takes place on a world called Ellis. Heroes must come together to save the realm from darkness while uncovering what happened to the heroes of old.

name: Hocus Defenders
description: An intense TD that combines holding out against waves of countless enemies with the need to use powerful spells through cards. Each game will be unique, and you will never face the same challenge twice. Also, you will unravel the story as you progress through the world as the roguelike that it is

name: Alekon
description: Wander around the Realm of Fiction to photograph dozens of whimsical creatures, Then befriend them through unique quests and minigames, from snowflake design, to tuning and playing crystal harps, to organizing parties.

name: Dead Man's Rest
description: A Wild West BxB story of love, murder, and revenge. Play as Lee "Blackjack" McCarthy on his hunt for the elusive Wild Bill—until a mysterious killing shatters all his plans.

name: Ultimate Rivals: The Court
description: Ultimate Rivals: The Court is an action-packed basketball arcade sports game bringing 140+ superstars together in a digital world in the near future. Powerhouse squads consisting of athletes from the NHL, NBA, MLB, WNBA, NFL Players Association, and US women’s soccer national team go head-to-head in 3-on-3 games with tons of above-the-rim acrobatics. The game includes top athletes ranging from all-time greats like Wayne Gretzky to sports biggest stars like Alex Morgan. In addition, WWE Superstars will join the roster in future updates including Roman Reigns, Charlotte Flair, and Dwayne Johnson (The Rock).

name: Fossil Corner
description: In Fossil Corner, you're a retired paleontologist, collecting fossils and solving evolutionary puzzles in your old garage.

name: Mage Mountain
description: Pick-up-and-play Deckbuilder with lots of synergistic depth. Slice through undead foes, and Level-up your 7 STATS. Synergize your STATS with your cards to maximize their effectiveness.

name: Liftoff: Micro Drones
description: Explore the world of FPV like never before! In Liftoff: Micro Drones any indoor area becomes an exciting aerial playground. Explore, customize and compete in this simulator dedicated to the micro drones class.

name: E.E.R.I.E
description: E.E.R.E.I is a open world TPS.In a modern magic world, play the role of three fully armed spirit girl from the eastern and western mythology, entering the dangerous war zone, using a variety of modern small arms and tactical equipment to complete their respective missions!

name: Wildzone
description: Open world first person shooter powered by DEEP LOCOMOTION SYSTEM.

name: Hero's Hour
description: Hero's Hour is a game inspired by the Heroes of Might and Magic turnbased strategy games. "Hour" refers to the more fast-paced gameplay, with combat taking place on a real-time simulated battlefield. You may just watch the battle as a casual player, or take control of your units as desired.

name: Beasts of Maravilla Island
description:
Beasts of Maravilla Island is a 3D Adventure game coming to Nintendo Switch, Xbox, PS4, and PC.

Embark on your adventure as an aspiring wildlife photographer in the hidden, magic jungles of Maravilla Island. Explore a mysterious 3D island and solve puzzles to discover extraordinary creatures, interact with them in their natural habitat, and photograph the enchanting, unique behaviors you reveal!

name: Hot Pot For One
description: You are alone on a cold, Christmas night, stuck at home, in a foreign country. You get through it by cooking a hot dish intended for six people.

name: NecroLand: Undead Corps
description: You have to beat all the other players and survive until the end to win. When the undead, who walks around the land of death, is knocked down and they become allies with you. Make countless undead obey you, as if you have become a necromancer, and lead to victory in battle.

name: Colddigger
description: Hatchball is more than just digital pinball - this game is played with eggs! Guide these eggs to your Hatchery, where they will be able to hatch into adorable creatures. Given love and care they will become powerful allies in your quest for the high score… and your best friends!

name: Hindsight 20/20
description: Hindsight 20/20 is a 3D third-person action-adventure game with morality-based decisions. Discover the power of your morality with choices and actions that truly matter.

name: SpessVR
description: Heavily inspired by Space Station 13! Live a robust life on a Space Station, grow plants, mutate them into new types of plants, mix different chemical reagents, and when you are ready, get out and explore outer space to acquire wealth by mining minerals on asteroids.

name: Xenosis: Alien Infection
description: You are a deep space salvage hunter who discovers the remains of the Starship Carpathian, thought to have been destroyed 50 years ago. You've hit the jackpot. The data core housed in the ship's AI will be worth a lifetime of credits on the Black Market, so you dock with the ship to retrieve it.

name: Doomed Love
description: Doomed Love is a hilarious simulation video game wherein you can romance the grotesque monsters from the hit first-person shooter, Doom.

name: Friday Night Funkin' 64
description: It's Friday Night! Play as the Boyfriend and battle Mario in this reimplementation of the hit indie game!

name: Guilty Gear: Strive + Season Pass 1
description:
This bundle includes the base game Guilty Gear Strive and it;s first Season Pass which adds 5 characters, 2 stages, the exclusive story expansion called Another Story and a color pack that adds 5 color variations for the 20 characters available with this package.

Original released as the Deluxe Edition for Guilty Gear Strive, this bundle was renamed along with a price change and the announcement of a new bundle, Ultimate Edition 2022.
Delisted on August 24th, 2023 with the release of Season Pass 3 and the Daredevil Edition

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Season Pass 1
description: The first Season Pass for Guilty Gear Strive includes 5 characters, 2 stages, the exclusive story expansion called Another Story and a color pack that adds 5 color variations for the base roster of 15 characters along with the 5 new characters in this pass.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Special Colors for Sol and Ky
description:
This early purchase reward unlocked color and effect swapped versions of Sol Badguy and Ky Kiske.

The pack was available for purchases on PlayStation and Steam from release till June 25th and on Xbox from release till April 13th. Physical versions received a single use code while supplies lasted.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character Color Pack
description: This color pack unlocks colors for the initial roster of 15 characters as well as the 5 characters from Season Pass 1 as they were released, for a total of 20 characters. There are 5 colors for every character, making for 100 extra colors available.

name: The Solitaire Conspiracy: The Atlantis Project
description:
The Atlantis Project is a noble force of aquatic avengers, hydrated heroes and lubricated legends. They fight for the seas, and all who treat the water with respect.

Players unlock this new crew via their own FMV campaign, hosted by Alanah Pearce. Via an intriguing story, players use their powerful Submerge skill, and take it into daily challenges, countdown and skirmish modes.

name: Pet Shop Snacks: Expansion Pack 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Pet Shop Snacks: Expansion Pack 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Coloring Pixels: Illusions Pack
description: Illusions BookThis Illusions Book brings 20 new images to Coloring Pixels! Each image is a different optical illusion to play with your eyes and mind!Get ready to take a second look to figure out what you're seeing!

name: Littlebird/TrueEyes
description: A fantasy otome game.

name: Call to Arms: Gates of Hell - Ostfront
description:
Independently developed by Barbedwire studios, published by Digitalmindsoft.
GoH is an RTS/ RTT that portrays WW2.
It offers a choice of instantly switchable top- down, third person and first person (for vehicles). SP, PvE, PvP. Dynamic campaigns are available for singleplayer and in co-op.

name: I woke up and now I'm a knight?!
description:
At last, the hero has arrived!

Waking up in a fantasy world on the brink of war, you'll have to rely on wits and cunning to survive, while calling on help from unlikely places!

Gather your companions and fight your way to the truth behind the vicious demon attacks before it's too late...

The key to everything is in your dreams…

name: Search All: Birds
description: A hidden object game in which you need to find all the birds in a large location. The birds will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Schildmaid MX
description: Neutral. Shield. Danger.

name: Dispatch
description: A short, story-driven horror game that follows a police dispatcher who receives a disturbing phone call.

name: Rouge noir
description: This is a short experience of a non euclidian game in unity. The only objective of this game is to raise diferent types of emotions, like confusion, happiness, calmness and joy.

name: Devil May Cry: Peak of Combat
description: Devil May Cry: Peak of Combat is a mobile action RPG spin-off of the Devil May Cry series.

name: Wax Museum: Seek and Find - Mystery Hidden Object Adventure
description: Enjoy the beautiful and extraordinary exhibits of the abandoned Wax Museum! Immerse yourself in a mystical detective story full of secrets and puzzles! The newest hidden object game.

name: Burst Squad
description: Burst Squad. online multiplayer fps game. earn points by killing enemies. be the best you!

name: Survival Simulator
description: Struggle to survive on a perilous and unknown planet. Environment, climate and creatures are threats all the time, but also may be your powerful boosts. Survival Simulator - How you survive on the last day?

name: Legends of Kingdom Rush
description:
An RPG game with roguelike elements developed in the medieval fantasy world of Kingdom Rush.

The Kingdom and the rest of the known world are now under the control of the dreadful Dark Army. However, a new threat bigger than the Dark Lord himself unites the heroes of the realm pushing the notions of good and evil aside.

Fight on a turn-based grid moving around the combat area. Switch and match your heroes and companions until you find your ideal team for each battle!

Find treasures, solve riddles, explore ruins, and so on. The world will react differently according to your decisions, so be careful!

name: Flowering Nightshade
description: The continuation of the lighthearted romance stories from Blooming Nightshade. Now living in Akiramine, Himeka must adjust to her adult life and responsibilities while supporting her friends. Continue from the romantic endings of the previous game or see a collection of new stories!

name: 枝江往事
description: Sin descripción

name: For Honor: Season 14 - Tyranny
description:
A genuine feeling of hope grew in everyone’s heart as the Truce of Wyverndale convinced more and more people across Heathmoor. Yet a sinister threat was also brewing. As the celebrations of the Honor Games continued with a reenactment of past battles against Apollyon and the Blackstones, a group of mysterious warriors geared up and gathered secret allies from all factions. Peace would soon become a distant dream...

In one of For Honor's most ambitious season's ever, Tyranny brings much anticipated updates from the community with fight updates, events, new customization, a new battle pass and a new Hero that will reveal themself amidst the season.

name: Kinkoi: Golden Loveriche
description:
Noble Private Academy.
An institution where future men and women of great wealth are cultivated.
It is a boarding school where students aren't merely educated, but also taught dignity.

This year, a sense of urgency hangs over the academy as a member of a royal family from a faraway Northern European country has been invited to attend.

In an unexpected turn, the princess takes a liking to our protagonist, Ichimatsu Ouro, and he is forced to attend Noble Academy alongside her.
That is when he ends up crammed into a vacant room in a nook of the women's dormitory...

name: Call to Arms: Gates of Hell
description:
Independently developed by Barbedwire studios, published by Digitalmindsoft.
GoH is an RTS/ RTT that portrays WW2.
It offers a choice of instantly switchable top- down, third person and first person (for vehicles). SP, PvE, PvP. Dynamic campaigns are available for singleplayer and in co-op.

name: Pokémon and the Last Wish
description:
Pokémon and the Last Wish is a fan made Pokémon game. It is not a ROM hack, but rather a game made in RPG Maker XP, using the Pokemon Essentials kit.

"Every 1000 years a comet appears in the night sky.
It can only be seen for seven days before it disappears again,
for another 1000 years. "The Millennium Comet" is a special type of comet,
containing an immense amount of energy.
It is said that this energy has the power to awaken 'The Wishmaker'."

This game was made by Voltseon and ENLS.

name: Park Alien: A ludo in the space
description: A ludo in the space, in which you play with aliens? What more you can ask for?

name: Remember Me
description: Remember Me is a galgame with a male first-person perspective. Players will play a high school student Lin Yining, and three girls launched their own story. It's up to you to choose between the hidden past and the future to reveal.

name: Mirror Magic
description: In this game, you play as a 30-year-old otaku who has never even held a girl's hand. But because chance coincidence however, accidentally met unexpectedly 3 beautiful person.What kind of story will three different styles of beauty unfold with you?

name: Neko Beach
description: At Neko Beach girls are hot by the sun and they are waiting for you with attention and shamelessness. And of course, there are the sea and palm trees.

name: Trap Adventure
description: "Trap Dungeon" is an old-schoold 2.5 roguelite game about an escape from dangerous dungeon. Avoid numerous deadly traps, hide from bloodthirsty enemies and press the buttons that will open the way for you!

name: Magic Mysteries
description: 魔法迷域是卡牌构筑+Roguelike+战旗

name: 你的女朋友
description: Your girlfriend, big and white. This game, strong and powerful. Want to be happy? Just a few mouse clicks away.

name: Dance with me
description: 《Dance with me》 is a classic single player online VR music game with classic music game playing method and unique dressing system. Put on gorgeous clothes for your favorite role, experience new music fun in the game, and more tracks are waiting for you to unlock!

name: The Story of Qingzhi Town
description: The betrayal of your partner makes you choose a different life. Although you have a vengeful heart, in this complex world, you still have new hopes and choices. Do you want to live with a mission, or let go of your obsession, or run your own hospital,or do you want to kill your enemy?

name: One more game
description: This is a single player self-propelled chess game including the mechanism of chess synthesis, relic, magic, front and back row position and so on. Players need to buy pieces, choose relic, defeat more and more powerful enemies and finally win

name: Word Escape
description: Create words to remove letters and flee through a procedurally generated dungeon. Armed with a customisable loadout of powerups, puzzle-solving and quick-thinking are required to escape the incoming wave of lava.

name: Japanese Puzzle
description: Japanese Puzzle is a puzzle-puzzle game made in 2D graphics, where you have to collect puzzles with anime girls.

name: Life In Planet
description: Build, arrive, and move into new regions and planets in the depths of space. Whether you will establish a colony and trade or train soldiers and fight, everything is in your hands.

name: Topper Carrier
description: Topper Carrier is a game that brings back the golden age of Arcade Racing games like Top Gear, Outrun and more!

name: Nature Treks: Together
description: Nature Treks: Together is a place just for you or a place to connect with others using a combination of shape, color, and sound. Intuitively transition deeper to rediscover the benefits of expression, the value of emotion, and escape into a powerful sensory experience.

name: VR Another World
description: This is a walking simulation software for VR. You can freely walk around the medieval European style world. There are no game elements at all, and you can enjoy all the elements in as little as five minutes.

name: Fractal Block World
description: This is a surreal exploration game. Explore a massive fractal with great complexities. You can shrink infinitely to go deeper into the fractal. Or you can become larger by growing. Inner space awaits you in this infinite world.

name: Dice Knight: Mystery of the Moirai
description: Play as a heroic gun wielding knight and explore a world where everything is dice. Money is dice, health is dice, weapons shoot dice and the story is about dice. Before you blast your way through hordes of enemies you must only ask yourself one thing: do you feel lucky?

name: Race Project
description: Win or loose, it's easy! The rules are simple, be the first who crosses the finish line or survive. Believe me, don't trust anyone!

name: Space puzzle
description: Space puzzle is a classic puzzle that offers you to put the picture together from a huge number of details!

name: Mad Wild Fairy Tale
description: Take control of the undead king. Manage your legacy domain and protect it from mortal trespassers. Mad Wild Fairy Tale is an Action RPG Strategy with hardcore survival and PvP-Trespassers mechanics. The game is set in a beautiful dark fantasy world.

name: Ballistic Machines
description: Build the world as you move, fight monsters and defeat your friends.

name: Dangerous Planet
description: Dangerous Planet - Space 2d arcade game associated with planetary gravity, where the player jumps from one planet to another, dodges spikes, and flying asteroids.

name: Swift Elf
description: Swift Elf is a 2D platformer with adventure elements. In it you have to play as a clever elf who found himself in mysterious lands. Help him find a way out, destroy monsters and go through location after location collecting bonuses on his way!

name: Hextones: Spacetime
description: Connect the Hextones to control the unstable relativity of the Spacetime travel! A matchup puzzle game with sci-fi mood and time mechanics, and an even more challenging endeavor through space!

name: Untitled Marble Game
description: Test your skills to the test in a brand new 3D mind-breaker platformer "Untitled Marble Game"! Various levels and a huge number of traps are waiting for you! There will be many difficulties on your way, challenge yourself to complete all levels!

name: HopHeaders
description: We present you a miniature arcade clicker game about people with square heads jumping on platforms and avoiding obstacles.

name: Mochi Jump
description: Mochi Jump is a simple, fun and addictive challenge of your reactions and reflexes.

name: Brainland
description: Designed for the rehabilitation training of the elderly and people with disabilities, this VR game provides a simulated learning environment for players to develop their motor, cognitive and life skills as well as express through artmaking within the playful experience.

name: Multilevel Parking Driver
description: Prepare for the ultimate driving and parking exercise! With elaborate, complex parking lots and a huge, detailed outdoor environment, the challenge is here to keep you engaged for a long time!

name: Super Soccer Blast: America VS Europe
description: Super Soccer Blast America vs Europe is an arcade-style football game that tackles football in a light-hearted and accessible way. As a breakaway from the seriousness of simulation and realism, it brings a very arcade style to the field with retro throwbacks. Prepare for the kick-off with a fast-paced football game, bringing a refreshing look to the football genre with accessible controls and skilled-based gameplay like over-the-top classic soccer games.

name: Cirno's Battle of Faith
description: Sin descripción

name: Independence Day Break Head to Head
description: Independence Day Break Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated pixel bricks tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: League of Champions Soccer
description: Live the Champions European League Football Cup like real players do. Choose your team and play the matches of the real draw until the final. Served by superbs 3D graphics, animations and sounds, League Of Champions Soccer is based on a highly realistic physic engine in which soccer moves have been coded by soccer fans for soccer fans.

name: You Are Being Followed
description: You Are Being Followed explores the perspective of Emma, a blind woman wrestling with the unknown. Emma is joined by her aging guide dog turned emotional support animal, Samuel, as the foundation of their relationship is called into question. A brief, audio-driven game exclusively for PlayStation VR, the title focuses on tone and exists largely as a mood piece.

name: Valley of No Roads
description: Valley of No Roads is a city building puzzle, where you create beautiful cityscapes and explore the procedurally generated maps. Build the relaxed city, that needs no roads.

name: Stand 'em Up
description: Punish your enemies, take their money, acquire new skills, supermoves… and eat shawarma! All this in a tornadic action “Stand 'em up” following the traditions of classic-style beat 'em ups.

name: Dome Discover
description: Adventure RPG with anime aesthetics set in a world populated by Domes, places where humans live without being able to escape. Do you dare to leave these places and know the truth?

name: The Chatters Show
description: The Chatters Show is designed for Twitch streamers and their chats. Create questions sets and play with your chat to see who is the smartest person.

name: 末代侠客
description: Sin descripción

name: No One Lives in Heaven
description: What happens to the inhabitants of a game world after you have finished it? In the story-driven, 40-hour role-playing game No one lives in heaven, you will encounter over 200 unique NPCs with over 300 quests that can be solved in various ways. Philosophical and crazy.

name: The Girl Who Sees
description: The Girl Who Sees is a point-and-click adventure and turn-based RPG hybrid that explores WWII history and Philippine fantasy. In 1944, young Quina discovers the mythical realm as her village survives under Japanese occupation. Two game styles: turn-based battles or cultural trivia.

name: Struggle For Talyria
description: Struggle for Talyria is a 2D JRPG set in the land of Talyria, a world so acquainted with war that peace seems an unattainable dream. A tale of political intrigue, magic, legends, and above all... Hope. Hope for a world that is slowly losing it, generation by generation.

name: Infinite Dungeon Crawler
description: Fantasy turn-based RPG. Build and customize your party with 8 character classes and lots of weapons and armor options. Explore and fight through randomly generated worlds in search of loot with over 35 monster types to battle. Lots of skills, abilities, and magik spells provide ample re-playability.

name: Secrets of Soil
description: Secrets of Soil is an interactive journey that explores the hidden world of soil and its role in combating climate change. Your journey will take you to a microscopic world, witnessing the essential life forms that live there.

name: Jgsw
description: Build realistic puzzles with thousands of pieces solo or online with friends!

name: Chrome Switcher
description: A color-switching parkour game. Utilize your acrobatic abilities to navigate through different versions of each level. Wall jump, zip-line, slide, climb across each color.

name: SEX VR Horny Nurses
description: Health is the most important thing, so go to the one-of-a-kind hospital JOY with the best treatments and the best staff! Sexy Nurse is an Adult game made especially for virtual reality.

name: Game Builder Garage
description: Turn gaming time into learning time with the Game Builder Garage software. Kids can learn how to make their own games with guided lessons created by Nintendo. From a simple game of tag to a run-and-jump obstacle course, each lesson is broken down into multiple, manageable segments that let kids go at their own pace—and have fun in the process. Learn the basics of visual game programming By playing through interactive lessons, kids will learn the basics of visual game programming. Nodon, colorful creatures with distinct personalities, keep kids engaged through lessons with tips and motivating messages. With a simple press of a button, swap between the programming screen and the game screen—watch how programming changes the game on the fly. Track progress and build confidence After completing each lesson and building a game, kids will test their knowledge by completing Checkpoints—small puzzles or tasks to solve with programming. Master these skills and head to Free Programming mode to let your imagination (and programming chops) run wild. The Nodon you meet each have distinct personalities that complement their functions. Have fun connecting them together to see how they interact and bring your game to life. The in-game Nodopedia lets you quickly check what each Nodon does as you create. There’s also a guide that recaps important skills! Easily swap between the Programming and Game screens to see the hard-working Nodon in action. Take advantage of the Nintendo Switch system’s many features. Instead of the control stick, program motion controls to control your game. Want to create…

name: Oniria Crimes: Rounder Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart - Launch Edition
description: Blast your way through an interdimensional adventure with Ratchet and Clank. This edition includes the Carbonox Armor from 2003's Ratchet & Clank: Going Commando and the Pixelizer weapon, which appeared in the 2016 Ratchet & Clank.

name: Neptunia reVerse: Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Scarlet Hollow
description: Scarlet Hollow is a horror-mystery game with sharp writing, dark humor, and hand-drawn art from Ignatz Award-winning graphic novelist Abby Howard.

name: Herman Electro
description: A puzzle roguelike about electricity, supertools, and freedom. Don't eat the mushrooms.

name: Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart
description: Go dimension-hopping with Ratchet and Clank as they take on an evil emperor from another reality. Jump between action-packed worlds and beyond at mind-blowing speeds, complete with dazzling visuals and an insane arsenal.

name: Countryballs: Modern Ballfare
description: The Definitive Political Debating Simulator. A wacky third-person multiplayer arena shooter inspired by Countryball memes - a game encouraging you to smash balls until someone finishes victoriously.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive
description: Discover the Smell of the Game with Guilty Gear: Strive! Immerse yourself in new gameplay mechanics designed to be simple and welcoming for fighting game newcomers, yet deep and creative for veterans. Ride the Fire into a heavy metal inspired alternate future full of over-the-top action, style and fun!

name: Survival & Simulator
description: Struggle to survive on a perilous and unknown planet. Environment, climate and creatures are threats all the time, but also may be your powerful boosts. Survival Simulator - How you survive on the last day?

name: Wrestling Trivia
description: How well do you know your Wrestling Trivia?

name: Dark Blood 2:The Cry of Souls
description:
DarkBlood2 -The Cry of Souls- is the sequel to DarkBlood -Beyond the Darkness-.

The game adds a story, a central town, stores, and a day/night cycle.

name: Let's Turn Pick-Up Beach to a Nudist Fucking Beach!
description: You are the owner of "Beach House", a shop run on a pick-up beach. Your goal is to change this pick-up beach into your dream nudist fucking beach where anyone can do lewd things whenever they want to. Spread rumors, hold events, etc, and change the beach's mood to make your dreams come true.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Touhou Collaborations Pack
description:
This “Touhou Collaborations Pack” contains collaborations between popular Touhou acts!
Enjoy the musical mixes that they've created!

name: VR Kayaking Game
description: Welcome to a virtual kayaking experience! Originally showcased at the 2021 Auckland Indie Games Showcase (and slightly reworked since then), this is a seated Virtual Reality sandbox experience where you can travel in your kayak by paddling around!

name: Collateral Thinking DX
description: Collateral Thinking DX is an arcade-style action platformer that's all about beating up alien ghosts and recovering blueprints on a tight schedule (and budget) to save the true victims - billionaires!

name: Trainbow
description: TRAINBOW is a mouse-based, maze-action game about collecting bulbs and restoring colour to the world! With a click of your mouse, you can lay down five consecutive tracks for your heroic Manpuck to travel along - and as Manpuck moves faster, so does the world around them.

name: Digital Terrarium: Pogona Virtual Pet
description: Digital Terrarium - Pogona is a simple virtual pet game. As the title implies, it's a virtual terrarium set up to care for a pogona lizard, more commonly known as a bearded dragon. The game features some customization options for your terrarium, as well as the color morph of your bearded dragon, which is a simple AI that wanders the tank and drinks periodically, as well as eats the cricket you can drop into the tank. It also includes an infographic with some educational text about bearded dragons.

name: T^2.5
description: It is just simple T-T-T on 3D cube.

name: The Strange Story of Brian Fisher: Chapter 2
description: After escaping from the old cabin, and falling down without consciousness, Brian Fisher traveled in time and space. He woke up 30 years ago, when he was a little boy, in a place that he doesn't remember where it is, and how he got there.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers - Additional Mission Pack: Another Rescube
description: This is an additional mission pack featuring new enemies that do not appear in the base game. Contains over 10 advanced missions designed for elite soldiers. That long-awaited creepy-crawly enemy that EDF enlistees were waiting for is finally here.

name: Amid the Lines
description: Amid the lines is A beat’em up with amazing fighting mechanics ,and an interesting storyline that will leave you wanting more. join detective Northwood’s journey and fight his fight.

name: The Adjudicator
description: "The Adjudicator" is an interactive video product deduced by real people. It uses the method of film + interactive gameplay to promote the development of the plot. The trend of the plot will be determined by you.

name: NASCAR Heat 5: Ultimate Edition
description: The NASCAR Heat 5: Ultimate Edition supplies you with all things NASCAR Heat 5! Ultimate Edition players will receive the Standard Edition game and all of our DLC packs from 2020 (July, August, September, October, Jimmie Johnson Pack, Playoff Pack, and December Pack) that feature new paint schemes, challenges, and more! You will also receive the Tony Stewart content that includes Tony as an option for the in-game spotter, an exclusive Career contract offer from Stewart-Haas Racing, and classic Tony Stewart paint schemes!

name: Tanks Bundle
description: If you love classic tank games or are up for a short challenge for in between this bundle is for you!

name: Spare Parts: Episode 2
description: Unit 03 is a sheltered, but bubbly, robot girl with a penchant for breaking the rules. After getting a tiny taste of the outside, she's become all the more desperate to break free of the cage she was born in. But so long as her body continues to malfunction, will that ever be more than a fantasy?

name: Wolfriders A Sniper Adventure
description: Wolfriders is a sniper game with a comic book style storytelling. Read the comic book chapters and play the short sniper and assault levels to unveil the immersive story.

name: Totally Normal Journey: The Interactive Musical
